TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScrollableControl extends System.Windows.Forms.Control implements class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable
Public Class ScrollableControl Inherits Control Implements IDisposable
public ref class ScrollableControl : System::Windows::Forms::Control, IDisposable
type ScrollableControl = class inherit Control interface IComponent interface IDisposable

summary.span: 定義支援自動捲動行為的控制項的基底類別。

span.span: Defines a base class for controls that support auto-scrolling behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不使用直接類別。You do not typically use the class directly. 和類別繼承自這個類別。The and classes inherit from this class. 類別是做為需要可捲動的控制項的基底類別。The class acts as a base class for controls that require the ability to scroll. 若要啟用的控制項來顯示捲軸，視需要請設定屬性，以`true`並設定至所需大小的屬性。To enable a control to display scroll bars as needed, set the property to `true` and set the property to the desired size. 當控制項的大小小於指定的最小大小，或子控制項位於控制項範圍以外時，會顯示適當的捲軸。When the control is sized smaller than the specified minimum size, or a child control is located outside the bounds of the control, the appropriate scroll bars are displayed. 若要以手動方式覆寫那一個捲軸會顯示，請設定和屬性。To manually override which scroll bars are visible, set the and properties. 如果其中一個屬性設定為`false`，相對應的捲軸不是可見的即使屬性設定為`true`。If either property is set to `false`, the corresponding scroll bar is not visible, even if the property is set to `true`. 您可以處理知道當使用者或程式碼捲動工作區的事件。You can handle the event to know when the user or code scrolls the client area. 當以程式設計方式將控制項加入表單，使用屬性控制項內部或在目前的可捲動區域外部的位置。When adding controls programmatically to a form, use the property to position the control either inside or outside of the current viewable scroll area.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值建構函式會執行下列動作：The default constructor performs the following actions: - 將目前的執行個體標示為容器控制項中，藉由呼叫方法來設定樣式來`true`。Marks the current instance as a container control by calling the method to set the style to `true`. - 可讓您藉由設定清除的背景至`false`。Enables background erasing by setting the to `false`. - 停用自動捲動，藉由呼叫方法來設定位元到`false`。Disables auto-scrolling by calling the method to set the bit to `false`.

summary.span: 根據目前控制項的位置以及目前選取的控制項，調整容器上的捲軸。

span.span: Adjusts the scroll bars on the container based on the current control positions and the control currently selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必要時，方法會配置用戶端區域中，包括調整顯示區域的大小，為必要項目，以容納捲軸。When required, the method lays out the client area, including resizing the display area as required to accommodate the scroll bars.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出容器是否可讓使用者捲動至任何放置在可視界限以外的控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the container enables the user to scroll to any controls placed outside of its visible boundaries.

value.span: 如果容器啟用自動捲動;否則， 。

span.span: if the container enables auto-scrolling; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`true`，這個屬性可讓容器具有大於可視界限的虛擬大小。When `true`, this property enables the container to have a virtual size that is larger than its visible boundaries. Windows Form 目前有一項限制，會導致在 啟用且 設為 的情況下，所有衍生自 的類別都無法正常運作。There is currently a limitation in Windows Forms that prevents all classes derived from from acting properly when both is enabled and is set to . 例如，假設您放置控制項這類-或容器類別衍生自(例如或)-在您的表單上。For example, let's say that you place a control such as - or a container class derived from (such as or ) - on your form. 如果您將容器上的 設為 ，然後在容器內的一或多個控制項上，將 屬性設為 ，則不顯示任何捲軸。If you set on the container to and then set the property on one or more of the controls inside of the container to , then no scrollbar ever appears. 衍生自 的類別作用如同 已設為 。The class derived from acts as if were set to . 目前唯一的解決方法是將 巢放在另一個 中。Currently, the only workaround is to nest the inside another . 例如，如果您需要 在此情況下運作，您可以將它放在 控制項中，並將 上的 設為 。For instance, if you need to work in this situation, you can place it inside of a control and set on the to . > [!NOTE] > 自動維護捲軸可見的性。 maintains the visibility of the scrollbars automatically. 因此，設定或是屬性設`true`沒有時生效已啟用。Therefore, setting the or property to `true` has no effect when is enabled. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何水平及/或垂直捲軸會自動提供，視需要時屬性設定為`true`。The following code example shows how horizontal and/or vertical scroll bars are provided automatically as needed when the property is set to `true`. 若要執行此範例，請遵循下列步驟：To run the example, follow these steps: 1. 新建 Windows Forms 應用程式Create a new Windows Forms application. 2. 將 加入表單。Add a to the form. 3. 新增面板並將它命名`text1`。Add a to the panel and name it `text1`. 4. 移動文字方塊中，使右側組件延伸超過面板的右邊緣。Move the text box so that the right part extends beyond the right edge of the panel. 您應該會看到 [面板] 中的界限之外的文字方塊部分的外框。You should see only an outline of the part of the text box that is outside the bounds of the panel. 如果可以看到整個文字方塊中，文字方塊會是在表單上，而不是在 [面板] 中。If the whole text box is visible, the text box is on the form and not in the panel. 5. 將 加入表單。Add a to the form. 6. 加入的處理常式`Click`按鈕的事件。Add a handler for the `Click` event of the button. 7. 新增下列的範例程式碼，並呼叫從按鈕的`Click`處理常式。Add the following example code and call it from the button's `Click` handler. 當您執行範例時，您可以只會看到 [面板] 中的界限內的文字方塊中的部分。When you run the example, you can only see the part of the text box that is inside the boundaries of the panel. 當您按一下按鈕時，您會看到出現可讓您查看其餘的文字方塊中的水平捲軸。When you click the button, you will see a horizontal scroll bar appear that will enable you to see the rest of the text box. 如果您的下方面板底部的文字方塊的一部分，您會看到垂直捲軸，當您按一下按鈕時。If you position a part of the text box below the bottom of the panel, you will see a vertical scroll bar when you click the button. 範例程式碼會檢查文字方塊是否超出界限的前面板設定屬性，以`true`，以及之前它會設定屬性。The example code checks to see whether the text box is outside the bounds of the panel before it sets the property to `true`, and before it sets the property. 這超出範圍檢查不需要。This out-of-bounds check is not required. 如果設為`true`，沒有捲軸會時，會顯示 [文字] 方塊完全面板中。If is set to `true`, no scroll bars will appear when the text box is completely within the panel. 此外，您可以保留的預設設定 0，0 的邊界。Also, you can leave the margins at their default settings of 0,0. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定自動捲動邊界的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the auto-scroll margin.

value.span: A表示像素為單位的自動捲動邊界的寬度與高度。

span.span: A that represents the height and width of the auto-scroll margin in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自動捲動邊界是任何子控制項和可捲動父控制項邊緣之間的距離。The auto-scroll margin is the distance between any child controls and the edges of the scrollable parent control. 大小也會加入可捲動的控制項，以判斷是否需要捲軸中包含任何子控制項的大小。The size is added to the size of any child controls contained in the scrollable control to determine whether or not scroll bars are needed. 屬性時，可捲動父控制項調整大小時，或個別子控制項已導入檢視中，會評估，以及用來判斷是否必須顯示捲軸。The property is evaluated when the parent scrollable control is resized or the individual child controls are brought into view, and is used to determine if scroll bars must be displayed. 停駐的控制項是以判斷是否必須顯示捲軸的計算會排除。Docked controls are excluded from the calculations that determine if scroll bars must be displayed. > [!NOTE] > 如果停駐的控制項屬性設定為控制項會填滿上層的可捲動控制項，使用時，會忽略停駐的控制項會來判斷是否需要捲軸。If a docked control's property is set to , the control fills the parent scrollable control and the docked control is ignored when using the to determine whether scroll bars are needed. 從子控制項的邊緣的距離，以可捲動父控制項是否指派給的值小於屬性和屬性設定為`true`，會顯示適當的捲軸。If the distance from the edge of a child control to the parent scrollable control is less than the value assigned to the property and the property is set to `true`, the appropriate scroll bar is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 我們建議，停駐控制項內的可捲動的控制項，當您加入子可捲動的控制項，例如，包含任何其他可能需要捲動的控制項。We recommend, when docking controls within a scrollable control, that you add a child scrollable control, such as a , to contain any other controls that might require scrolling. 您應該加入子系控制項以可捲動的控制項並將其屬性設定為及其屬性設定為`true`。You should add the child control to the scrollable control and its property set to and its property set to `true`. 您應該設定以可捲動父控制項的屬性`false`。You should set the property of the parent scrollable control to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別中， 。The following code example uses the derived class, . 此範例評估的文字方塊中的位置，並變更的外觀和行為，與其父容器，面板控制項。The example evaluates the location of a text box and changes the appearance and behavior of its parent container, the panel control. 這個範例需要您已建立的執行個體控制，和。The example requires that you have created an instance of a control, , and . 將文字方塊放置在 [面板] 中，讓它至少一個面板的邊緣重疊。Place the text box on the panel so that it overlaps at least one of the panel's edges. 在按一下按鈕，以查看差異面板的行為和外觀上呼叫此函式。Call this function on the click of a button to see the difference in the panel's behavior and appearance. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.AutoScroll Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The or value assigned is less than 0.

summary.span: 取得或設定自動捲動大小的最小值。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum size of the auto-scroll.

value.span: A ，決定使用者可以捲動的虛擬區域大小下限。

span.span: A that determines the minimum size of the virtual area through which the user can scroll.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來管理配置給自動捲軸的螢幕大小。The property is used to manage the screen size allocated to the automatic scroll bars.

summary.span: 取得或設定自動捲動位置的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of the auto-scroll position.

value.span: A表示自動捲動位置，像素為單位。

span.span: A that represents the auto-scroll position in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性代表可捲動的控制項的可見部分的位置。The property represents the location of the visible portion of a scrollable control. 您可以使用這個屬性來變更所顯示控制項的部分。Use this property to change the portion of the control that is displayed. 當以程式設計方式將控制項加入表單，使用屬性控制項內部或在目前的可捲動區域外部的位置。When adding controls programmatically to a form, use the property to position the control either inside or outside of the current viewable scroll area. > [!NOTE] > 和擷取座標的值為負數，如果控制項已捲動離開其起始位置 (0，0)。The and coordinate values retrieved are negative if the control has scrolled away from its starting position (0,0). 當您設定這個屬性時，您必須一律指派正和設定捲軸位置相對的開始位置的值。When you set this property, you must always assign positive and values to set the scroll position relative to the starting position. 比方說，如果您有水平捲軸，並將 x 及 y 設為 200，您移動捲軸 200 像素為單位向右;如果您接著將 x 和 y 到 100 之間，捲軸就會向左移 x 100 像素，因為您會將它設定 100 像素離開的開始位置。For example, if you have a horizontal scroll bar and you set x and y to 200, you move the scroll 200 pixels to the right; if you then set x and y to 100, the scroll appears to jump the left by 100 pixels, because you are setting it 100 pixels away from the starting position. 在第一個案例中，傳回 {-200，0;} 在第二個案例中，它會傳回{-100,0}。In the first case, returns {-200, 0}; in the second case, it returns {-100,0}. 若要偵測何時變更，建立事件處理常式事件，將舊的位置值儲存在私用變數，並比較新的值，以在後續的舊值事件。To detect when changes, create an event handler for the event, save the old position value in a private variable, and compare the new value to the old value on subsequent events. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生類別並將按鈕加入至可捲動區域左上角。The following code example uses the derived class and adds a button to the upper left corner of the scrollable area. 此範例是用來位移取決於。The example allows for the offset determined by the . 此範例假設您有寫入，其中包含使用上面。The example was written under the assumption that you have a that contains a with a on it. 若要啟用自動捲動，放置按鈕以外的工作區。To enable auto-scrolling, place the button outside of the client area of the . [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl/CPP/scrollablecontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl/CS/scrollablecontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl/VB/scrollablecontrol.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets the rectangle that represents the virtual display area of the control.
A that represents the display area of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`，則屬性是虛擬的大小和位置控制項。If the property is set to `true`, the property is the virtual size and position of the control. 比方說，如果寬度和高度這兩個 100 像素和控制項包含超過它的界限，控制項代表大小必須是包含所包含的控制項。For example, if the width and height of the are both 100 pixels and the control contains controls that extend beyond its boundaries, represents the size the needs to be to include the contained controls. 同樣地，並的屬性相關的捲動位置。Similarly, the and properties of are relevant to the scroll position of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會控制此控制項停駐元件內框線。This property controls the border inside of this control for docked components. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別中， 。The following code example uses the derived class, . 此範例會停駐在面板控制項中的按鈕，並不斷循環屬性，設定每個個別上按下按鈕。The example docks a button in a panel control and cycles through the properties, setting each individually on the click of the button. 這個範例需要您已建立的執行個體控制項和在表單上，而且您已經宣告類別層級的成員變數，名為`myCounter`為 32 位元帶正負號的整數。The example requires that you have created an instance of a control and a on a form, and you have declared a class level member variable named `myCounter` as a 32-bit signed integer. 您應該呼叫此程式碼上按鈕的事件。You should call this code on the event of the button. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPadding Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPadding Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPadding Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述的旗標控制項會使用。The following table describes the flags the control uses. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||用來擷取遮罩是否屬性設定為`true`。A mask used to retrieve whether the property is set to `true`.| ||用來擷取遮罩是否屬性設定為`true`。A mask used to retrieve whether the property is set to `true`.| ||用來擷取遮罩是否屬性設定為`true`。A mask used to retrieve whether the property is set to `true`.| ||用來擷取是否將使用者所做的遮罩捲軸。A mask used to retrieve whether the user has made the scroll.| ||遮罩，用來擷取是否使用者已啟用完整視窗拖放作業。A mask used to retrieve whether the user has enabled the full window drag-and-drop operation.|

summary.span: 引發 事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果垂直捲軸為可見的也就是說屬性設定為`true`，滑鼠滾輪捲動垂直控制。If the vertical scroll bar is visible, which means that the property is set to `true`, the mouse wheel scrolls through the control vertically. 不過，如果只有水平捲軸為可見的這表示設定為`false`並屬性設定為`true,`水平捲動滑鼠滾輪。However, if only the horizontal scroll bar is visible, which means that the is set to `false` and the property to set to `true,` the mouse wheel scrolls horizontally. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Scroll As ScrollEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於使用者或程式碼捲動工作區時。

span.span: Occurs when the user or code scrolls through the client area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件發生於使用者捲動捲軸，與互動的工作區，或是當使用者瀏覽控制項之間和作用中的控制項將捲動至檢視。The event occurs when the user scrolls through the client area by interacting with the scroll bars, or when the user navigates between controls and the active control scrolls into view. 當您撰寫程式碼，例如設定時，也就會發生事件捲動工作區的屬性。The event also occurs when you write code, such as setting the property, that scrolls through the client area. 您可以使用屬性，在您的事件處理常式，以判斷捲軸方向事件。You can use the property in your event handler to determine the scroll bar orientation for the event. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`ScrollableControl1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `ScrollableControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#74](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#74)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#74](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#74)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ScrollControlIntoView(class System.Windows.Forms.Control activeControl) cil managed

param.name: activeControl
param.span: 要捲動至檢視中的子控制項。

span.span: The child control to scroll into view.

summary.span: 將指定的子控制項捲動至已啟用自動捲動之控制項的檢視中。

span.span: Scrolls the specified child control into view on an auto-scroll enabled control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性必須設為`true`，而且至少一個捲軸、 水平或垂直，必須也是可見的如方法造成影響。The property must be set to `true`, and at least one of the scroll bars, horizontal or vertical, must also be visible, for the method to have an effect. 若要顯示水平和垂直捲軸，請並屬性，分別必須設為`true`。To make the horizontal and vertical scroll bars visible, the and properties, respectively, must be set to `true`. 如果`activeControl`參數不是子控制項、 未執行的動作。If the `activeControl` parameter is not a child control, no action takes place. 這個方法可能會引發事件。This method may raise the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會啟用自動捲動的表單、 調整表單，並確保按鈕保持可見的表單的大小時之後。The following code example enables auto-scrolling for a form, resizes the form, and ensures that a button remains visible after the form is resized. 這個範例需要您所具有名為`button2`在其上。The example requires that you have a with a named `button2` on it. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CPP/controlmembers5.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CS/controlmembers5.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/VB/controlmembers5.vb#2)]

summary.span: 值會決定屬性。

span.span: Determines the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位是遮罩。The field is a mask. 您可以使用它與並方法來取得和設定屬性。You can use it with the and methods to get and set the property.

summary.span: 判斷使用者是否已啟用完整視窗拖曳。

span.span: Determines whether the user has enabled full window drag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位是遮罩。The field is a mask. 使用它來搭配和方法來取得和設定是否使用者已啟用完整視窗拖曳。Use it with the and methods to get and set whether the user has enabled full window drag. 啟用完整視窗拖曳時，視窗的內容會顯示當使用者移動並調整大小的 windows。When full window drag is enabled, the contents of windows are displayed when the user moves and sizes the windows.

summary.span: 決定是否的值屬性設定為。

span.span: Determines whether the value of the property is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位是遮罩。The field is a mask. 使用它來搭配並方法來取得和設定屬性。Use it with the and methods to get and set the property.

summary.span: 判斷是否有使用者已捲動控制項。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位是遮罩。The field is a mask. 使用它來搭配方法來取得是否使用者已捲動。Use it with the method to get whether the user had scrolled through the .

summary.span: 決定是否的值屬性設定為。

abstract member ScrollToControl : System.Windows.Forms.Control -> System.Drawing.Point override this.ScrollToControl : System.Windows.Forms.Control -> System.Drawing.Point

param.name: activeControl
param.span: 要捲動至檢視中的子控制項。

span.span: The child control to scroll into view.

summary.span: 計算指定之子控制項的捲動位移。

span.span: Calculates the scroll offset to the specified child control.

returns.span: 左上相對於將控制項捲動至檢視所需的用戶端區域的顯示區域。

span.span: The upper-left hand of the display area relative to the client area required to scroll the control into view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用方法來計算距離它必須捲動至顯示在指定的控制項。The method uses the method to calculate how far it must scroll to display the specified control. 子控制項的屬性用來調整捲動的位置。The property of the child control is used to adjust the scrolled position. 不會造成捲動;方法通常用於後續捲動到 導出的位置。 does not cause scrolling; the method is typically used to subsequently scroll to the calculated position.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetAutoScrollMargin (int x, int y);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetAutoScrollMargin(int32 x, int32 y) cil managed
Public Sub SetAutoScrollMargin (x As Integer, y As Integer)
public: void SetAutoScrollMargin(int x, int y);

span.span: The value.
The value.

summary.span: 設定自動捲動邊界的大小。

span.span: Sets the size of the auto-scroll margins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 邊界設定每個控制項周圍的框線的高度與寬度。The margin sets the width and height of the border around each control. 此邊界來判斷捲軸在容器上所需和選取控制項時，捲動到的位置。This margin is used to determine when scroll bars are needed on the container and where to scroll to when a control is selected. > [!NOTE] > 如果在傳遞負數，則將它作為`x`或`y`值，該值將會重設為 0。If a negative number is passed in as the `x` or `y` values, the value will be reset to 0. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別中， 。The following code example uses the derived class, . 此範例評估的文字方塊中的位置，並變更的外觀和行為，與其父容器，面板控制項。The example evaluates the location of a text box and changes the appearance and behavior of its parent container, the panel control. 這個範例需要您已建立的執行個體控制，和。The example requires that you have created an instance of a control, , and . 將箱子放置在面板上，使它至少一個面板的邊緣重疊。Place the box on the panel so that it overlaps at least one of the panel's edges. 在按一下按鈕，以查看差異面板的行為和外觀上呼叫此子程序。Call this subprocedure on the click of a button to see the difference in the panel's behavior and appearance. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollableControl.SetAutoScrollMargin Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.SetAutoScrollMargin Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollableControl.SetAutoScrollMargin Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.SetAutoScrollMargin Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollableControl.SetAutoScrollMargin Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.SetAutoScrollMargin Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
